item.title: Efficiency and performance
item.description: This following content is a transcript from Site Reliability Engineering with some, maybe none, personal adjustments. Efficient use of resources is relevant any time a service cares about money. Because SRE ultimately controls provisioning, it must also be involved in any work on utilization, as utilization is a function of how a given service works and how it is provisioned. It follows that paying close attention to the provisioning strategy for a service, and therefore its utilization, provides a very, very big lever on the service’s total costs.
